Smart Watering Can: A watering can with a built-in sensor that measures the moisture level of the soil and only waters the plants when they need it.
Self-Watering Can: A watering can with a-activated system that automatically waters the plants at regular intervals.
Solar-Powered Watering Can: A watering can that uses solar energy to power a water pump, allowing it to be used in remote areas without electricity.
Watering Can with Built-in Humidifier: A watering can that also releases moisture into the air, helping to keep the surrounding area humidified.
Watering Can with Built-in UV Sterilizer: A watering can that uses UV light to kill harmful bacteria and viruses in the water, ensuring that the plants are always watered with clean and safe water.
